RTCPeerConnectionRemoteDescription.summary:
The remoteDescription read-only property of the interface returns a describing the session (which includes configuration and media information) for the remote end of the connection.
If this hasn't been set yet, this is null.

remarks.para: The returned value typically reflects a remote description which has been received over the signaling server (as either an offer or an answer) and then put into effect by your code calling in response.
